descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 3 Ponies at Honningbrew Meadery. Black with white socks, Pony sized Shadowmere and a Black and White Paint.

  The Black with white socks pony texture is from the mod 'Horses of Skyrim'  
  I made the textures for the Black and White Paint pony. (Mane and tail textures were from Horses of Skyrim though)

  Mod is compatible with Convenient Horses and pretty much any horse mod.


  Hope you enjoy the ponies :D 
  Let me know if you'd like to see any other ponies added
author: Jessica
